bullshit.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something that is stupid and completely untrue
bullshit.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Forget all that bullshit and listen to me!
What he told me was a load of bullshit.
bullshit.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to say something stupid or completely untrue, especially in order to deceive someone or make them think you are important
